verses.verse: At that time <S%G2540><s%> Herod <S%G2264><s%> the tetrarch <S%G5068><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> the news <S%G189><s%> about Jesus, <S%G2424><s%>

and said <S%G3004><s%> to his servants, <S%G3816><s%> "This <S%G3778><s%> is John <S%G2491><s%> the Baptist; <S%G910><s%> he has risen <S%G1453><s%> from the dead; <S%G3498><s%> and that is why <S%G1223><s%> miraculous <S%G1411><s%> powers <S%G1411><s%> are at work <S%G1754><s%> in him."

For when Herod <S%G2264><s%> had John <S%G2491><s%> arrested, <S%G2902><s%> he bound <S%G1210><s%> him, and put <S%G659><s%> him in prison <S%G5438><s%> on account <S%G1223><s%> of Herodias, <S%G2266><s%> the wife <S%G1135><s%> of his brother <S%G80><s%> Philip. <S%G5376><s%>
For John <S%G2491><s%> had been saying <S%G3004><s%> to him, "It is not lawful <S%G1832><s%> for you to have <S%G2192><s%> her."

And although he wanted <S%G2309><s%> to put <S%G615><s%> him to death, <S%G615><s%> he feared <S%G5399><s%> the multitude, <S%G3793><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> they regarded <S%G2192><s%> him as a prophet. <S%G4396><s%>

But when Herod <S%G2264><s%>'s birthday <S%G1077><s%> came, <S%G1096><s%> the daughter <S%G2364><s%> of Herodias <S%G2266><s%> danced <S%G3738><s%> before <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3319><s%> [them] and pleased <S%G700><s%> Herod.
Thereupon <S%G3606><s%> he promised <S%G3670><s%> with an oath <S%G3727><s%> to give <S%G1325><s%> her whatever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1437><s%> she asked. <S%G154><s%>

And having been prompted <S%G4264><s%> by her mother, <S%G3384><s%> she said, <S%G5346><s%> "Give <S%G1325><s%> me here <S%G5602><s%> on a platter <S%G4094><s%> the head <S%G2776><s%> of John <S%G2491><s%> the Baptist. <S%G910><s%>"

And although he was grieved, <S%G3076><s%> the king <S%G935><s%> commanded <S%G2753><s%> [it] to be given <S%G1325><s%> because <S%G1223><s%> of his oaths, <S%G3727><s%> and because of his dinner <S%G4873><s%> guests. <S%G4873><s%>
And he sent <S%G3992><s%> and had John <S%G2491><s%> beheaded <S%G607><s%> in the prison. <S%G5438><s%>
And his head <S%G2776><s%> was brought <S%G5342><s%> on a platter <S%G4094><s%> and given <S%G1325><s%> to the girl; <S%G2877><s%> and she brought <S%G5342><s%> [it] to her mother. <S%G3384><s%>

And his disciples <S%G3101><s%> came <S%G4334><s%> and took <S%G142><s%> away <S%G142><s%> the body <S%G4430><s%> and buried <S%G2290><s%> it; and they went <S%G2064><s%> and reported <S%G518><s%> to Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> when Jesus <S%G2424><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> [it,] He withdrew <S%G402><s%> from there <S%G1564><s%> in a boat, <S%G4143><s%> to a lonely <S%G2048><s%> place <S%G5117><s%> by Himself; <S%G2398><s%> and when the multitudes <S%G3793><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> [of this,] they followed <S%G190><s%> Him on foot <S%G3979><s%> from the cities. <S%G4172><s%>

And when He went <S%G1831><s%> ashore, <S%G1831><s%> He saw <S%G3708><s%> a great <S%G4183><s%> multitude, <S%G3793><s%> and felt <S%G4697><s%> compassion <S%G4697><s%> for them, and healed <S%G2323><s%> their sick. <S%G732><s%>

And when it was evening, <S%G3798><s%> the disciples <S%G3101><s%> came <S%G4334><s%> to Him, saying, <S%G3004><s%> "The place <S%G5117><s%> is desolate, <S%G2048><s%> and the time <S%G5610><s%> is already <S%G2235><s%> past; <S%G3928><s%> so <S%G3767><s%> send <S%G630><s%> the multitudes <S%G3793><s%> away, <S%G630><s%> that they may go <S%G565><s%> into the villages <S%G2968><s%> and buy <S%G59><s%> food <S%G1033><s%> for themselves. <S%G1438><s%>"
But Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "They do not need <S%G5532><s%> to go <S%G565><s%> away; <S%G565><s%> you give <S%G1325><s%> them [something] to eat! <S%G2068><s%>"

And they said <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "We have <S%G2192><s%> here <S%G5602><s%> only <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1487><s%> <S%G3361><s%> five <S%G4002><s%> loaves <S%G740><s%> and two <S%G1417><s%> fish. <S%G2486><s%>"
And He said, <S%G3004><s%> "Bring <S%G5342><s%> them here <S%G5602><s%> to Me."

And ordering <S%G2753><s%> the multitudes <S%G3793><s%> to recline <S%G347><s%> on the grass, <S%G5528><s%> He took <S%G2983><s%> the five <S%G4002><s%> loaves <S%G740><s%> and the two <S%G1417><s%> fish, <S%G2486><s%> and looking <S%G308><s%> up toward <S%G1519><s%> heaven, <S%G3772><s%> He blessed <S%G2127><s%> [the food,] and breaking <S%G2806><s%> the loaves <S%G740><s%> He gave <S%G1325><s%> them to the disciples, <S%G3101><s%> and the disciples <S%G3101><s%> [gave] to the multitudes, <S%G3793><s%>

and they all <S%G3956><s%> ate, <S%G2068><s%> and were satisfied. <S%G5526><s%> And they picked <S%G142><s%> up what <S%G3588><s%> was left <S%G4052><s%> over <S%G4052><s%> of the broken <S%G2801><s%> pieces, <S%G2801><s%> twelve <S%G1427><s%> full <S%G4134><s%> baskets. <S%G2894><s%>
And there were about <S%G5616><s%> five <S%G4000><s%> thousand <S%G4000><s%> men <S%G435><s%> who ate, <S%G2068><s%> aside <S%G5565><s%> from women <S%G1135><s%> and children. <S%G3813><s%>

And immediately <S%G2112><s%> He made <S%G315><s%> the disciples <S%G3101><s%> get <S%G1684><s%> into the boat, <S%G4143><s%> and go <S%G4254><s%> ahead <S%G4254><s%> of Him to the other <S%G4008><s%> side, <S%G4008><s%> while <S%G2193><s%> He sent <S%G630><s%> the multitudes <S%G3793><s%> away. <S%G630><s%>

And after He had sent <S%G630><s%> the multitudes <S%G3793><s%> away, <S%G630><s%> He went <S%G305><s%> up to the mountain <S%G3735><s%> by Himself <S%G2398><s%> to pray; <S%G4336><s%> and when it was evening, <S%G3798><s%> He was there <S%G1563><s%> alone. <S%G3441><s%>

But the boat <S%G4143><s%> was already <S%G2235><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> stadia <S%G4712><s%> away <S%G568><s%> from the land, <S%G1093><s%> battered <S%G928><s%> by the waves; <S%G2949><s%> for the wind <S%G417><s%> was contrary. <S%G1727><s%>
And in the fourth <S%G5067><s%> watch <S%G5438><s%> of the night <S%G3571><s%> He came <S%G2064><s%> to them, walking <S%G4043><s%> on the sea. <S%G2281><s%>

And when the disciples <S%G3101><s%> saw <S%G3708><s%> Him walking <S%G4043><s%> on the sea, <S%G2281><s%> they were frightened, <S%G5015><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "It is a ghost! <S%G5326><s%>" And they cried <S%G2896><s%> out for fear. <S%G5401><s%>
But immediately <S%G2117><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> spoke <S%G2980><s%> to them, saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Take <S%G2293><s%> courage, <S%G2293><s%> it is I; do not be afraid. <S%G5399><s%>"

And Peter <S%G4074><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> Him and said, <S%G3004><s%> "Lord, <S%G2962><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> it is You, command <S%G2753><s%> me to come <S%G2064><s%> to You on the water. <S%G5204><s%>"

And He said, <S%G3004><s%> "Come! <S%G2064><s%>" And Peter <S%G4074><s%> got <S%G2597><s%> out of the boat, <S%G4143><s%> and walked <S%G4043><s%> on the water <S%G5204><s%> and came <S%G2064><s%> toward <S%G4314><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>

But seeing <S%G991><s%> the wind, <S%G417><s%> he became afraid, <S%G5399><s%> and beginning <S%G757><s%> to sink, <S%G2670><s%> he cried <S%G2896><s%> out, saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Lord, <S%G2962><s%> save <S%G4982><s%> me!"

And immediately <S%G2112><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> stretched <S%G1614><s%> out His hand <S%G5495><s%> and took <S%G1949><s%> hold <S%G1949><s%> of him, and said <S%G3004><s%> to him, "O you of little <S%G3640><s%> faith, <S%G3640><s%> why <S%G1519><s%> <S%G5101><s%> did you doubt <S%G1365><s%>?"
And when they got <S%G305><s%> into the boat, <S%G4143><s%> the wind <S%G417><s%> stopped. <S%G2869><s%>
And those <S%G3588><s%> who were in the boat <S%G4143><s%> worshiped <S%G4352><s%> Him, saying, <S%G3004><s%> "You are certainly <S%G230><s%> God's Son! <S%G5207><s%>"
And when they had crossed <S%G1276><s%> over, <S%G1276><s%> they came <S%G2064><s%> to land <S%G1093><s%> at Gennesaret. <S%G1082><s%>

And when the men <S%G435><s%> of that place <S%G5117><s%> recognized <S%G1921><s%> Him, they sent <S%G649><s%> into all <S%G3650><s%> that surrounding <S%G4066><s%> district <S%G4066><s%> and brought <S%G4374><s%> to Him all <S%G3956><s%> who were sick; <S%G2560><s%>

and they [began] to entreat <S%G3870><s%> Him that they might just <S%G3441><s%> touch <S%G681><s%> the fringe <S%G2899><s%> of His cloak; <S%G2440><s%> and as many <S%G3745><s%> as touched <S%G681><s%> [it] were cured. <S%G1295><s%>
